overview: In this lusty tale of champagne dreams and chicken-fried reality. Sunset Thomas plays Trixie Turnbull, a wistful truck stop waitress waiting for her turn in the glamorous life. While she slings hash and pours endless cups of joe she fantasized about beautiful cars, expansive clothes and hot sex with anyone and everyone who's willing. Then one day a handsome stranger comes into the diner and changes Trixie's life forever. It turns out that this one is better than any fairy godmother! I mean, screw the fairy dust, Trixie has found herself a hot guy with a hard cock and lots of CASH!
title: Truckstop Trixie
